relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Great Alert system, easy to get in contact with campus security. I always feel safe on campus and thier are great programs to help individuals out when in sticky situations.
There are 5 different fraternities and 4 sororities

The Kissing Rock- it said that if a couple has their first kiss here they will get married. Hike to the Point- all first-year students hike the trails that students took to get to school when it was just beginning, then eat lunch on the president's lawn Wiffle Ball Tournament- During spring term students and faculty participate in many games of wiffle ball President's Halloween Party- a newer tradition, every year the President holds a party and costume contest on her residence
Many Clubs and Activities Greek Life Student Run Dining facility (The Shoebox) Intramural sports Lounging in dorm buildings Workout Center
Make sure you get involved Work hard Be open minded
It is a great place to be and easy to enjoy everyday. I am learning how to be myself and how to broaden my horizons. I am looking forward to being here for the next three and a half years.

textAfterTable: Hanover is a very safe campus. Security is always available any time of day if you need a ride home or want someone to walk them to class. Their office is located on campus and can often be seen driving around campus. Greek Life Hanover has four sororities and five fraternities. Almost 50% of the campus is involved in Greek life and scholarship is important in the recruitment process. They sponsor philanthrophy events throughout the year and are involved in many organizations. Clubs and Activities There are over 60 organizations and clubs on campus. No matter your interests, there is something for you! Great for these types of students Hanover is a wonderful campus for students looking for a small community. The professors here will know you on a personal level and help you succeed. Although the campus is small, it is beautiful and full of life. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus On Hanover's campus there is a special place called the Point. This is on the edge of campus overlooking the Ohio River. This is the only place in which you can see three bends in the Ohio River. The campus is surrounded by woods in which there are trails to hike and waterfalls
